# Tender Announcement RFP 412
## Contract Title (Eng Français)
RFP 412: Stream 3A, Financial Instruments Valuation – Farm Credit Canada

## Contact Information
Beth Cooper
Office of the Auditor General of Canada
240 Sparks Street
Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1A 0G6
Phone: (613) 952-0213
Email: [suppliers@oag-bvg.gc.ca](mailto:suppliers@oag-bvg.gc.ca)

## Tender Description
The Office of the Auditor General of Canada (OAG) is seeking a contractor to provide professional services to assist the OAG audit team in conducting the audit work of some of the models for the ACL calculation. The contractor will review the work of Farm Credit Canada to assess the reasonableness of the models used.

## Requirements
* The contractor must be a qualified Audit and Related Services Supply Arrangement (SA) Holder who has been invited to submit a bid.
* The contractor must have expertise in economic and modeling related to the agriculture industry, within the context of financial instruments/loan impairment methodology.
* The level of security required for this contract is Reliability.
* The work completed under this contract will be classified as Protected A.

## Applicable Trade Agreements
* The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* The Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement

## Contract Duration
* The proposed contract duration is from February 12, 2024 to June 30, 2024.

## Important Notes
* This requirement is open only to invited Audit and Related Services Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders.
* The audit and related services Request for Supply Arrangement is an ongoing opportunity for qualification solicitation.
* For suppliers who wish to become a qualified supply arrangement holder, please visit the ongoing opportunity for qualification solicitation posted on CanadaBuys.
* Please refer to the Tender Description or Tender Documents for additional information.
* Tendering Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

## Closing Date
January 10, 2024 at 16:00:00
